Body:
I have rpi 2 running windows IOT and I want to run python script on it. unfortunately I am having this error after the deploy

I wrote the script using visual studio 2015 as a windows iot core background application.

Did you follow the tutorial in https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/iot/win10/samples/python and Deploy your Python app to your Windows IoT Core device following https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/iot/win10/samples/python?

I think this question should first of all be asked at Raspberry Pi StackExchange Forum.

And from the the Error Messages that both of you seem to be having is somehow your network interfaces such as Loopback Addresses cannot be accessed using the codes that have been written with Visual Studio. With Linux kernel based system you generally need to run your code with the help of sudo which might be synonymous to Windows: Run as Admin try running your code as Admin and maybe it should work out. And also you might need to overrun your Firewall settings if there are any on your Windows IoT core

"
